    • Uses of TransformationFunctionInterface in dempred.datastructure

      Methods in dempred.datastructure with parameters of type TransformationFunctionInterface 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      static double DatasetResult.averageFoldError(Dataset<?> dataset, TransformationFunctionInterface transformationFunction)
      Calculates the Average fold error.
      static double DatasetResult.logLoss(Dataset<?> dataset, TransformationFunctionInterface transformationFunction)
      Computes the Log loss of a dataset.
      static double DatasetResult.pcc(Dataset<?> dataset, TransformationFunctionInterface transformationFunction)
      called "linear correlation coefficient" (r) or "Pearson product moment correlation coefficient" (pcc) in case of linear regression: can be squared to get r^2 but not same as "coefficient of determination" in all cases! the transformation is accomplished before the calculation.
      static double DatasetResult.r2q2(Dataset<?> dataset, TransformationFunctionInterface transformationFunction)
      Calculates the R2q2 value.
      static double DatasetResult.rmsd(Dataset<?> dataset, TransformationFunctionInterface transformationFunction)
      Calculates the Residual Mean Square Deviation (RMSD).
